long_description: Enhancing comfort with a built-in liner, the REI Sariska Double shorts are designed to move with you from pose to pose. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking outer fabric and liner briefs offers mechanical stretch and a smooth feel. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Breathable waistband elastic won't stifle skin underneath. Active fit and flat seams complement your motions on the yoga mat. The REI Sariska Double shorts feature drop-in pockets and a rear envelope pocket.
